Hello I'm Jack Front-end Developer_

I'm Zaky Irwansyah Andhika, a Front-end Web Developer based in Medan Kota, North Sumatra, Indonesia. Currently studying Information Technology, I'm honing my skills in Math and Backend Technology. Proficient in Next.js/React Js, state management, and responsive web design, I'm dedicated to creating top-notch user experiences while staying up-to-date with the latest trends. Let's collaborate on innovative front-end projects and make a difference together.

Short introducing_

I'm a college student at Universitas Muhammadiyah Sumatera Utara, pursuing a degree in Information Technology. I'm deeply passionate about honing my skills in Math and Backend Technology. This journey reflects a commitment to learning, adapting, and creating innovative solutions for exceptional user experiences in the dynamic world of web development.

Detail-Oriented and Perceptive

I excel in state management, responsive web design, and delivering seamless user experiences. These strengths reflect my meticulous attention to detail and perceptive understanding of user interactions.

Let's Showcase my Project_

Our-connected Blog Apps

This Blog App is a dynamic fusion of blogging and social interaction. Sign up effortlessly, express yourself, and engage with a global community. Customize your profile picture and connect through 'loving' posts from diverse users. Join us now to redefine how you share and connect through the art of blogging.

Watchyu Movies App with TMDB Api

This website, WatchYu, redefines your movie-watching experience by offering an innovative platform to curate your very own watchlist. Through seamless authentication, you gain access to a world of detailed movie information. Uncover insights about production, explore trailers, and even discover similar films that align with your taste. Elevate your cinematic journey with WatchYu, where every movie moment is just a click away.
